title: Embodied learning and analogy game-based early numerical representation development program

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary statistical concepts and data interpretation skills
context.additional_context: A program for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields to enhance spatial representation of numerical data and analogical reasoning.

learning_goals: Learners achieve at least 80% proficiency in mapping numerical data to spatial coordinates within four weeks
Learners develop strategies to visually represent complex numerical relationships through analogy-based games
Construct a data analysis model applying the space-numerical alignment principle in the final project
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
